about: I'm Finlay and I work as a sound designer, recordist, editor, and mixer. I'm also a Sound Design BSc (Hons) graduate. On this page, I will have ambient recordings, spot effects, design sound effects, and soundscapes. You can find more of my recordings for sale on the following platforms: https://www.pond5.com/artist/fmaudio#1/2080 https://audiojungle.net/user/f_m_audio/portfolio â€‹ To visit my portfolio website, click the link below: https://mcfadzeanfinlay.wixsite.com/fmaudio To visit my YouTube channel, click the link below: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYGtB913bwaynjCyFo7TURw To visit my social media accounts for my sound work, see below: https://www.facebook.com/FinMcFAudio/ https://www.instagram.com/finlaymcfadzean/?hl=en https://vimeo.com/user79378501 https://soundcloud.com/user-292300363 https://www.linkedin.com/in/finlay-mcfadzean-096334137/
